summary: During the Korean War, aboard the U.S.S. Princeton, Navy Commander Dan Collier reminisces about his first assignment on the same aircraft carrier in the war against Japan.
cast: Sterling Hayden|Richard Carlson|William Phipps|John Bromfield|Keith Larsen|William Schallert|Todd Karns|Phyllis Coates|Dave Willock|Walter Coy|Peter Adams|Richard Bartlett|James Best|David Bond|William Cabanne|Clancy Cooper|Bob Cudlip|Richard Emory|Bill Forelich|William Forrest|Leonard Freeman|Don Garner|Richard Grayson|Wade Hamilton|Don Hayden|John Heric|Tom Irish|John Kuehl|Jack Larson|Billy Lechner|John Lomma|Joel Marston|Roger McGee|Lee Millar|Alvy Moore|Roland Morris|Bill Neff|William Newell|Bob Peoples|Bob Sanford|William Tannen|Glen Vernon|Harlan Warde|Katherine Warren
keywords: airplane shot down|aircraft carrier landing|korean war|flashback|commander
title: Flat Top
